name: Bots Together Strong
description:
Bots Together Strong is a submission for Brackeys game jam which is themed "Stronger Together"

so the basics of the game is that there are two bots and they (you) need to work together to pass a level

this can be giving the other bot a boost so it can reach, sacrificing the one bot so the other bot can pass, or having one bot stand on a button so a bot can pass through.

it pretty simple

Check this guy out for he is the one who helped with the art: https://zerokirai.itch.io
